body.name: Neutrogena Deep Clean Daily Facial Cream Cleanser with Beta Hydroxy Acid to Remove Dirt, Oil & Makeup, Alcohol-Free, Oil-Free & Non-Comedogenic, 7 fl. oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 20 mins
features: 7-fluid ounce tube of Neutrogena Deep Clean Cream Facial Cleanser to help improve dull complexion, for skin that looks and feels healthier
This daily facial cleanser is made with beta hydroxy acid and goes deep down into pores to dissolve dirt, oil and makeup, and wash away dead surface cells
Oil-free and alcohol-free, the face wash features a creamy, deep-cleansing lather that won't dry your skin
It's dermatologist-tested and rinses clean without leaving behind any pore-clogging residue, for fresher, healthier-looking skin
From a dermatologist recommended skincare brand, the deep clean face wash is non-comedogenic so it won't clog pores
body.description: Product Description Deep clean your skin for a healthy complexion with Neutrogena DEEP Clean Cream Cleanser. This clean-rinsing, daily cream facial cleanser works two ways to leave your complexion looking fresh and healthy. First, the face wash goes deep down into pores to dissolve dirt, oil, and makeup. Then the dermatologist-tested cleanser uses the power of beta hydroxy acid to remove dead surface skin that can dry and dull your complexion, improving the look and feel of your skin. Dermatologist-tested, this deep clean facial cleanser is alcohol-free and oil-free, so it won't dry your skin or leave behind pore-clogging residue. It's also non-comedogenic so it won't clog pores. Brand Story By Neutrogena From the Manufacturer Deep Clean Cream Cleanser has a penetrating and refreshing formula that improves your complexion. This oil-free product removes dead surface cells that can dry, roughen and dull your complexion. See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At a Glance: Oil-free Non-comedogenic (won't clog pores) Deep Clean Cream Cleanser Deep Clean Cream Cleanser works two ways to improve the look and feel of skin. First, this dermatologist-tested formula cleanses deep down into pores—dissolving dirt, oil and makeup. Then, it removes dead surface skin that can dry, roughen and dull your complexion. It rinses clean, without leaving any pore-clogging residue. Skin looks fresher and healthier, feels cool and refreshed.

Works deep so skin feels extra clean Deep Clean cleansers leave your complexion looking fresh, healthy and smooth from a deep, more thorough cleansing. These dermatologist-tested formulas work to improve the look and feel of skin by: Cleaning deep down to pores dissolving dirt, oil & makeup. Removing dead surface skin that can dry-out, roughen & dull your complexion. Rinsing clean without leaving any pore-clogging residue.

Directions: Wet face and squeeze cleanser into hands. Apply to face and massage gently, avoiding contact with the delicate eye area. Rinse thoroughly. If you experience dryness or irritation, use less frequently.

About Neutrogena Neutrogena is a brand of the Johnson & Johnson Consumer Inc. Dermatologist-recommended* skincare brand, Neutrogena offers some of the world's most loved beauty and skin care lines, and manufactures and markets products in over 70 countries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Now My favorite facial cleanser! Not drying at all and clean feeling

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product works
reviews.reviewText: I loved using this product daily. I basically used twice a day. I loved how after you use it , it leaves your face feeling fresh, clean, and smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best cleanser without over drying your skin
reviews.reviewText: I have oily skin & use this twice a day & it never dries out my skin & it leaves it feeling very refresh & clean. I got my husband, daughter, & girl friend using this & they love it too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My skin just really likes this cleanser, for whatever reason. I've tried high end, low end, and everything in between....this is just what works best for me, and I keep coming back to it despite my desire for a "nicer" face cleanser. Cleans really well without leaving my face feeling stripped, and I love the creamy texture. The slight mentholated tingle is also nice and makes me feel more refreshed. The salicylic acid is the perfect amount for me to keep monthly hormonal breakouts at bay, and also softens some of my middle-aged fine lines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well and…
reviews.reviewText: good value for the money. I use a makeup towelette first then use this for a deep clean. Neutragena offers quality products at a good price. Why pay huge prices for tiny jars of celebrity products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you've never used this product, you are missing out!!!
reviews.reviewText: This cream cleanser is the best. I actually use a facial scrub first, and then use this as a second wash. Leave it on for at least a minute and let it do its work. The menthol really opens up your pores. The moisturizers in the cream leave your skin feeling really soft. I shave in the shower. I use a regular shaving gel for a first shave, use this product to wash my face, and then do a second shave with this product still on my face. The menthol helps the hairs stick up just that much more so you can get a really close shave. You could even use this product as a primary shaving cream. Just make sure to leave it on for a minute first so that it can clean your face like it's supposed to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this for years and love how well it cleans my face. I would recommend this product to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it! Doesn't dry your skin.
reviews.reviewText: This cleanser isn't overly scented. It's thick and creamy. I feel like it cleans and removes the oils without stripping them. I don't need face lotion after I get out of the shower. I will definitely keep ordering Neutrogena. Works for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Very good, I am happy with what I received

El mejor limpiador para mi piel. Tengo la piel mixta (grasa en la zona T y seca en las mejillas) y con tendencia a los puntos negros y este limpiador es el que mejor me deja la piel. Lo he usado durante cuatro meses en clima tropical humedo y es espectacular.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cleanser good for people with sensitive skin

reviews.reviewText: Refrescante ! Suave con la piel, no hace espuma.
It works like a charm, im on my second bottle now. It cleans and changes the complexion of my skin for sure. Get it if you think you have dull skin.
